title: Inventory API - OpenAPI Example

header.title: Introduction
header.content: This example demonstrates how to integrate external OpenAPI 3.0 specifications (YAML/JSON) with APIDoc v5.

footer.title: About OpenAPI
footer.content: OpenAPI 3.0 is an industry-standard specification for RESTful APIs. APIDoc v5 can seamlessly integrate with existing OpenAPI files.
